title: Rainy season
brief_description: In this video diary style film, Kuchar lets go of his usual comic persona to explore “the depression inherent to festive occasions.” From Thanksgiving dinner with friends, to a student film night disrupted by a riot, to a solemn conversation with a lover. Kuchar demonstrates the melancholy that accompanies his day-to-day routine in the rainy California holiday season.
